title: BRIEF-Troy Resources Updates On Operations At Karouni Gold Mine In Guyana
text:
© Reuters. BRIEF-Troy Resources Updates On Operations At Karouni Gold Mine In Guyana

Oct 15 (Reuters) - Troy Resources Ltd :

* UPDATES ON OPERATIONS AT KAROUNI GOLD MINE IN GUYANA

* ON 10 OCT, RECEIVED LETTER FROM JUNIOR MINISTER DIRECTING THAT THERE BE CESSATION OF ALL MINING ACTIVITIES WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT

* MANAGEMENT IS HOPING TO MEET WITH RELEVANT OFFICIALS OF GUYANESE GOVERNMENT OVER COMING DAYS TO DISCUSS WAY FORWARD AT KAROUNI

* CO TOOK STEP OF STANDING DOWN ALL SITE EMPLOYEES EXCEPT FEW

* EMPLOYEES ARE NOT DISMISSED AND CAN RESUME THEIR NORMAL DUTIES IF, OR WHEN ACTIVITIES ON-SITE ARE ABLE TO RESUME

* CO HAS ENCOUNTERED ONGOING STABILITY ISSUES AT SMARTS 3 PIT
